pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sphinx-multiproject[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/readthedocs/sphinx-multiproject/tree/main.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/readthedocs/sphinx-multiproject/tree/main)[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/sphinx-multiproject/badge/?version=latest)](https://sphinx-multiproject.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)Build multiple Sphinx projects from a single repository on[Read the Docs](https://readthedocs.org).**If you aren't using Read the Docs to build your documentation,you probably don't need this extension,read [this](https://sphinx-multiproject.readthedocs.io/page/advanced-usage.html#sharing-a-conf-py-file-without-using-an-extension)**.Check the documentation at <https://sphinx-multiproject.readthedocs.io/>.
